page.title: 06PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content:
{ TWO BALL
Two ball is where you get two balls and throw them at a wall and there are many types of games that you can play. Here are some of the different variations:- 1) You stand still and throw the balls at the wall.Every time you throw the ball you either form a cross with your arms and put them to your chest or just clap your hands then catch the ball. 2) Throw the balls at the wall then when you have caught them throw them into the air then back at the wall then up in the air again then under your legs and start again.
